thread.title: Mike Huckabee uses Kevin McCarthy's House speaker race withdrawal to back rhetoric
thread.title_full: Mike Huckabee uses Kevin McCarthy's House speaker race withdrawal to back rhetoric - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Mike Huckabee uses Kevin McCarthy's House speaker race withdrawal to back rhetoric
text: Republican presidential candidate Mike Huckabee on Thursday said the discord over the next House speaker shows the time has come to burn the "Washington political machine" to the ground and then build it back up. "The race for Speaker of the House is not about Kevin McCarthy, it's about burning the ... ...
